name: Hey Revia
headline: Voice AI to automate complex phone calls for healthcare providers
description: Hey Revia is a voice AI that handles complex phone calls for healthcare providers. Our software automates complex menus, reduces hold times, and handles tedious phone callsâ€”verifying provider details, updating insurance info, and securing approvals. We offer Revia as web app, mobile app and API.

founders.name: Shaun Wei, CEO & Co-founder
founders.description:
Building voice AI assistant for phone call. 
Ex-googler worked on Google Assistant. Previously worked on self-driving car in Pony.ai

founders.name: David (Wenbo) Zhu, Founder
founders.description:
Building a voice AI assistant for phone call.
Previously at Google, Brex.

## Save time with Revia
Give your workflow a boost
### Credentialing
Verification of healthcare provider credentials to ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.
![cloud lock](https://heyrevia.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcloud_lock.cafb784b.svg&w=640&q=75)
### Prior authorization
Streamlining the process to reduce delays in patient care and ensure coverage for necessary services.
![document protection](https://heyrevia.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdocument_protection.635186da.svg&w=640&q=75)
### Referrals and Specialist Consultations
Coordinating patient referrals to specialists and managing consultations or second opinions.
### Billing and Payment Inquiries
Addressing issues with billing, payments, and insurance claims with insurance companies or billing departments.
![](https://heyrevia.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fblur2.9ad5fb2d.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Watch Revia easily handle your most challenging phone calls
See Revia in actionâ€”saving you 15 minutes on every call, freeing up time for more meaningful patient and provider engagement.
![HIPAA compliance](https://heyrevia.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhipaa.e52a9aee.png&w=750&q=75)
Calls to Aetna typically take 15 mins
#### Call initiated
Connected to a interactive voice response (IVR) system.
0.00 seconds
#### Provided basic information
Entered provider's NPI number, member ID, and other required details navigating through the automated menu.
63.23 seconds
#### Waiting and holding
Reached a queue to speak with a Aetna representative, with 8 people ahead.
122.27 seconds
#### Talking to human
Connected to a representative after 10 minutes, confirmed provider's network status, verified NPI number, and shared application ID to continue or start a new authorization request/application.
700.18 seconds
#### Confirmation
Call concluded after confirmation of all necessary details or submission of the application.
912.11 seconds
